701102f-a.text:
Gerard Ave. (foreground), at the N.E. corner of East 140th Street, showing the site upon which was later erected the Cushman Laundry. The 22-story frame house, in the background, faces on the east side of
Walton Ave.
November 9, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.

701103f-a.text:
Gerard Ave., at East 140th Street, showing:(right foreground) part of the Edwards and Co. factory,at the S.E. corner of the aforementioned streets; the Cushman Laundry.at the N.E. corner;and the rear of the 12-story Lehigh Valley Railroad warehouse.at the S.W. corner of East 144th
Street.
November 29, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
